org.sonatype.plexus.components.cipher

Class DefaultPlexusCipher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sonatype.plexus.components.cipher.DefaultPlexusCipher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PlexusCipher

    @Singleton
 @Named(value="default")
 @Typed(value=PlexusCipher.class)
public class DefaultPlexusCipher
extends Object
implements PlexusCipher
    Default implementation of PlexusCipher. This class is thread safe.
    Author:
    Oleg Gusakov
